Job Description:
-  We are looking for React Native Developer who can build cross platform high performance mobile / web apps.

 -  Great UI implementation skills.

 -  Good knowledge of frontend Java Script frameworks (ReactJS ,  Typescript ,  ES6+ etc.)

 -  Knowledge of Native platform API s for deep integration on iOS / Android.

 -  Understanding of REST API s and GraphQL.

 -  Understanding of functional and object - oriented programming.

 -  Experience with automated test suites will be an advantage.

 -  Familiarity with native build tools like XCode ,  Gradle etc. will be a plus.
